content: Property AMA SG Budget Babe Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Aug 2018How do you plan to get a home and how much are you planning to set aside for that?I think saving 100k before the age of 30 is impressive given that you don't come from a privileged background! I understand that you have yet to buy your own home, was that a deliberate financial decision?1 answerAnswerBump0
